entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High 8 except plus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h. High 8 except plus 1 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
